God Works Through the Gifts--The infinite wisdom of God has employed human agencies to cooperate with Him in His work for the salvation of man. He has a variety of agencies with different gifts, and all are to cooperate harmoniously, 


                                     -100- 

each filling his own special, God-given sphere of action. We are to work for the salvation of our fellow men, not by judging them, but by showing forth what the Lord has done for us in the transformation of character.--Letter 23a, 1893, p. 20. (To E. H. Gates, January 10, 1893.)
